titles.title: National Guard and Reserve Entrepreneurship Support Act
National Guard and Reserve Entrepreneurship Support Act
National Guard and Reserve Entrepreneurship Support Act
National Guard and Reserve Entrepreneurship Support Act
National Guard and Reserve Entrepreneurship Support Act
National Guard and Reserve Entrepreneurship Support Act
A bill to support entrepreneurs serving in the National Guard and Reserve, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

calendar.text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Reported by Senator Risch with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 635.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
By Senator Risch from Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship filed written report. Report No. 115-448.
